channel.title: [pi] Webclient
channel.description:
Dear forum users,
I am currently using the Enhanced PI Client Version 4, and I'm really not good at signing JARs etc. I also cant manage to get my JAR to work, without screwing up my Cache, since its not in my Program Files.
Is anybody here willing to create the JAR for me, including the cache downloader?
I would really appreciate that, since it's really frustrating!
~ Michael

item.title: [pi] Webclient
item.dc:creator: @boi_jx boi_jx
item.description:
@boi_jx wrote:

if u have teamviewer ill do it for u and guide you through how to jar it but I don’t sign my clients unless I am actually gonna try to make a sponsored server

Read full topic

item.description:
